Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.production

Interface ProductionSlot

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseProduction, DevelopmentCardProduction, LeaderCardProduction
public interface ProductionSlot

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean canInsertOnTop​(DevelopmentCard newDevelopmentCard)
    Used to check if a specific Development Card can be put "ON_TOP" of a Production Slot
    boolean clearCurrentBuffer()
    Replaces back the questionMarks in the depositSlot
    int countCardsWith​(int level, Colour c)
    Checks the amount and the type of development cards active
    boolean fillQuestionMarkInput​(ResourceType resourceType)
    This method is used by the controller to insert the user's requested resources instead of the question marks (Production input only)
    boolean fillQuestionMarkOutput​(ResourceType resourceType)
    This method is used by the controller to insert the user's requested resources instead of the question marks (Production output only)
    ProductionAbility getProductionAbility()  
    java.util.ArrayList<ResourceContainer> getProductionInput()
    Returns to the caller the list of all the required resources
    java.util.ArrayList<ResourceContainer> getProductionOutput()
    Returns to the caller the list of all the production outputs
    int getQMI()
    gets the number of question marks inside the input
    int getQMO()
    gets the number of question marks inside the output
    int getVictoryPoints()
    Gets the amount of victoryPoints
    boolean hasQuestionMarks()
    Checks if the ProductionSlot has question marks in its production pattern
    boolean hasStillQuestionMarks()
    Checks if all the QM have been filled
    boolean insertOnTop​(DevelopmentCard newDevelopmentCard)
    Used only for slots that have queues if the queue is empty it simply sets the new card status to "ON_TOP" and adds the new card in the queue if the queue already has elements in it and if level+1 of the element on top == new card level the method sets the first element of the queue to "ACTIVE" and then adds the new one
    boolean isEmpty()  
    java.lang.String toString​(int id)  

  • Method Details

    • hasQuestionMarks

      boolean hasQuestionMarks()
      Checks if the ProductionSlot has question marks in its production pattern

    • hasStillQuestionMarks

      boolean hasStillQuestionMarks()
      Checks if all the QM have been filled

    • fillQuestionMarkInput

      boolean fillQuestionMarkInput​(ResourceType resourceType)
      This method is used by the controller to insert the user's requested resources instead of the question marks (Production input only)
      Parameters:
      resourceType - is the user's selected resourceType

    • fillQuestionMarkOutput

      boolean fillQuestionMarkOutput​(ResourceType resourceType)
      This method is used by the controller to insert the user's requested resources instead of the question marks (Production output only)
      Parameters:
      resourceType - is the user's selected resourceType

    • clearCurrentBuffer

      boolean clearCurrentBuffer()
      Replaces back the questionMarks in the depositSlot

    • insertOnTop

      boolean insertOnTop​(DevelopmentCard newDevelopmentCard)
      Used only for slots that have queues if the queue is empty it simply sets the new card status to "ON_TOP" and adds the new card in the queue if the queue already has elements in it and if level+1 of the element on top == new card level the method sets the first element of the queue to "ACTIVE" and then adds the new one
      Parameters:
      newDevelopmentCard - a new DevelopmentCard to add to the queue in Deck
      Returns:
      true if everything goes right, false if you can't add the newDevelopmentCard for some reasons

    • canInsertOnTop

      boolean canInsertOnTop​(DevelopmentCard newDevelopmentCard)
      Used to check if a specific Development Card can be put "ON_TOP" of a Production Slot
      Parameters:
      newDevelopmentCard - the DevelopmentCard to checj
      Returns:
      true if everything goes right, false if you can't add the newDevelopmentCard for some reasons

    • countCardsWith

      int countCardsWith​(int level, Colour c)
      Checks the amount and the type of development cards active
      Returns:
      the number of cards with level "level" and colour "c"

    • isEmpty

      boolean isEmpty()
      Returns:

    • getProductionInput

      java.util.ArrayList<ResourceContainer> getProductionInput()
      Returns to the caller the list of all the required resources

    • getProductionOutput

      gets the number of question marks inside the input

    • getQMO

      int getQMO()
      gets the number of question marks inside the output
      Returns:
      the number of question marks

    • getVictoryPoints

      int getVictoryPoints()
      Gets the amount of victoryPoints
      Returns:
      the sum of the victoryPoints

    • getProductionAbility

      ProductionAbility getProductionAbility()
      Returns:
